price: 21 En vérité, lorsque la terre sera secouée et entièrement rasée,
arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: kallā idhā dukkati al-arḍu dakkan dakkan
